title: Dinosaur National Monument: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Social Media              Social Media          Stay connected and learn what is happening in and around Dinosaur National Monument. We want to connect with you, and keep you connected to us, whether you are a frequent Dinosaur visitor or live on the other side of the world! We continue to look for new ways to communicate our messages, news, stories and ideas about this very special place. If we join new social media avenues, you will hear about it here.         Facebook www.facebook.com/DinosaurNPS Current photos, special park programs, and up-to-date information are frequently posted. You can also share your photos, memories and monument experiences with us.          Twitter twitter.com/DinosaurNPS Follow us on Twitter and receive tweets from us with breaking news, severe weather warnings, closure updates, special event announcements, and other information.         Flickr www.flickr.com/photos/dinosaurnps/ High Quality images are available for download and added throughout the year. Please credit the National Park Service and photographer (if provided).         Instagram instagram.com/dinosaurnps/ See our photos and share photos of your adventures in Dinosaur National Monument. Tag your photos with @dinosaurnps or use #DINO100, #DNM, #dinosaurnps, or #DinosaurNM.
